At PDF Merger AI, your privacy is foundational. Our tools run entirely in your browser, and your files never leave your device. Below is our clear, professional policy.

What We Process

  • PDF files you load are processed locally in-memory within your browser (no uploads).
  • No file contents are transmitted to any server we control.
  • Temporary objects created during processing are discarded when you refresh or close the tab.

Data We Do Not Collect

  • No accounts, logins, or passwords.
  • No document contents or metadata.
  • No behavioral tracking, ad-tech, or third‑party analytics.

Contact Information

If you contact us by email, we use your message solely to respond and support you. We do not sell or share this information.

Cookies and Tracking

We do not use cookies, beacons, or fingerprinting. The app functions fully without tracking.

Security

We minimize data by design. Files never leave your device. Our site is served over HTTPS, and we routinely update dependencies.

Third‑Party Services

We avoid third‑party analytics and ads. If a service is strictly necessary for functionality (e.g., hosting, CDN), it receives no access to your files.

Your Rights

We do not store your files or personal data. If you emailed us, you may request deletion of your messages at any time.

Children’s Privacy

Our service is not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

Changes

We may revise this policy to reflect improvements or legal requirements. Material changes will be reflected on this page with an updated effective date.

Contact

Email: info@pdfmergerpro.com
